title: Murder on the Orient Express
author: Agatha Christie
description: Join Hercule Poirot in solving a mysterious murder case aboard the luxurious Orient Express.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson
description: Embark on a thrilling investigation with journalist Mikael Blomkvist and hacker Lisbeth Salander.

title: Sherlock Holmes: The Hound of the Baskervilles
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
description: Solve the mystery of the legendary hound with the brilliant detective Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: Dive into the twisted and suspenseful story of a woman's disappearance and the secrets that unravel.

title: In the Woods
author: Tana French
description: Uncover the mysteries of a detective's past and a chilling murder case in a small Irish town.

title: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
description: Embark on a thrilling quest for hidden secrets and cryptic codes in this international detective novel.
